item.title: One week summer trekking tour example
item.description: Upper Svaneti, where Mestia is, is perfect for active tourism. There are many trails in the mountains for tourists. From Mestia, you can go on short or long hikes. Here’s an easy week-long tour. One week tour example Day 1 Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.
